string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Antialiasing:Set antialiasing on for better graphics. Switching it off reduces battery usage and improves performance.
Survival Rule:Survival rules are the number of neighbours that a live cell requires to stay alive till the next round.
Birth Rule:Birth rules are the number of neighbours that a dead cell requires to be become live in the next round.

Swipe Trail:Swipe trail is the type of trail that your finger leaves when you touch the screen. A rectangular trail leaves a blocky effect whereas a circular trail leaves a more natural effect. Pause the game before swiping to see the difference more clearly.
Swipe:Swipe anywhere onscreen to bring the touched cells to life and observe the game.
Disable Tips:You can disable the showing of tips dialog on startup by unchecking the option in General Settings.
Show Tips:You can also see the tips dialog in game by pressing the Show Tips button under General Settings.
FPS:By pressing the faster or slower buttons, you can change the game speed. Faster FPS allows you to see the end result quicker.
Canvas Lock:While the canvas is locked, you can swipe onscreen to bring cells to life. When unlocked, you can swipe to pan and pinch to zoom the canvas.
Random Fill:Fills the entire canvas with cells randomly. Roughly 30 percent of the cells are brought to life.
Clear:Clears the canvas and kills all cells which are alive.
